name: h2o-torrent
description: an interactive code notebook for the h2o-3 machine learning platform

scripts.rawgit: rm -rf vendor/h2oai && mkdir vendor/h2oai && cd vendor/h2oai && curl -O https://cdn.rawgit.com/h2oai/h2o-flow/6b3a83253c9487ee140c259de94c5213c40527c3/vendor/h2oai/lightning.min.js
scripts.start: npm install && bower install && rawgit && gulp
scripts.build-js: rollup -c  -- src/index.js && cp build/js/flow.js ../../../h2o-3/h2o-web/src/main/resources/www/flow/js/ && cp build/js/flow.js ../../../h2o-3/h2o-web/lib/h2o-flow/build/js/
scripts.build-no-libs: gulp build-templates build-styles && rollup -c -- src/index.js && cp -r build/ ../../../h2o-3/h2o-web/src/main/resources/www/flow/ && cp -r build/ ../../../h2o-3/h2o-web/lib/h2o-flow/build/
scripts.build: rawgit && gulp && rollup -c -- src/index.js && cp -r build/ ../../../h2o-3/h2o-web/src/main/resources/www/flow/ && cp -r build/ ../../../h2o-3/h2o-web/lib/h2o-flow/build/
scripts.build-h2o: npm run patch && cd ../h2o-3/ && ./gradlew build -x test

author: @micahstubbs <micah.stubbs@gmail.com> (https://twitter.com/micahstubbs)
